title: According to Chrisley
overview: Patriarch Todd Chrisley will host new half-hour after show According to Chrisley  in which he'll interact with an audience and offer advice on topics such as marriage, parenting, sex and relationships. Additionally, every episode will feature a member of the Chrisley family, as well as a celebrity guest. Confirmed guests include Ali Landry, Chris Jericho, Nicole Sullivan, Erika Girardi, Metta World Peace, Jason George, Christina Milian, Heather and Terry Dubrow and Carmen Electra.
